verbs.description: On his [ARGM-LOC: nationally] [V: syndicated] [ARG1: radio talk show] Tuesday , host Mark Levin hosted President Donald Trump ’s National Security Advisor John Bolton regarding Trump ’s decision to withdraw from the United Nations Human Right Council , a decision that Bolton explains was made in an effort to protect American sovereignty .
